title: Akshay Kumar, Nargis Fakhri bury the hatchet
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Asira Tarannum | October 24, 2015, 06.31 am Akshay Kumar Not very long ago, Akshay Kumar and Nargis Fakhri weren’t on the most cordial of terms, thanks to the latter walking out of a film at the last minute to pursue her Hollywood dreams. Nargis had abandoned The Shaukeens when a Hollywood production company roped her in for a project — much to Akshay’s displeasure, since her dates were already committed to the film. There were reports that Akshay was mighty upset initially, but let go after sensing Nargis’ strong desire to work with an international team.
Now, we hear that the two may come together for Rohit Dhawan’s Dishoom starring Varun Dhawan. Said a source, “Akshay and Nargis are most likely to do a cameo in the film.”
Meanwhile, Akshay shares a very good equation with Rohit, who he worked with on the latter’s first project as a director, Desi Boyz. Akshay is known to maintain a good relationship with those he appreciates in the industry, so his decision to work on Rohit’s next film with Nargis may well be an off-shoot of that as well. We contacted Rohit to confirm the news of the cameo, but he remained unavailable for comment.
